ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisReappointment of BARBARA BERGER of Montréal, Quebec, to be a full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Montréal Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour for a term of two years, effective October 28, 2004.
